data.message: There is a business page that has MY BUSINESS phone number on it, and customers call me all the time and are angry that I cannot help them. This page has not been active for 5 years, and yet I get calls EVERY DAY. Is there ANYONE that can help me??? ANYONE?? I have been marking this page as PERMANENTLY closed for FIVE years and nobody is doing anything to solve the problem. As a very busy business, I cannot change my phone number at this point to resolve the problem. Please advise.
